thread.title: Lover of Lobster!
thread.title_full: Maine Lobster Now reviewed by Lover of Lobster!

author: Lover of Lobster!
title: Lover of Lobster!
text: I received 2 lbs of claw and tail meat lobster for my birthday and was in absolute heaven!! Maine Lobster Now had it packaged so that it would stay nice and cold. I was so thrilled that I ordered some for my Aunt's birthday! She is a hard person to buy for and this was PERFECT! She had lobster for days! The folks at Maine Lobster Now were so wonderful to work with and when I made a mistake on my order, they were there to make sure everything was perfect. I highly recommend them and will be ordering again soon!
